title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - November 2, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - November 2, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark link up to talk about the developments in the Kyle Rittenhouse trial that is now underway and they touch on the tragic news of NFL player Henry Ruggs' involvement in a tragic car accident leaving one dead. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
